ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: They keep on going, people in my guild have gotten between 400-500 on some resists (with bards of course hehe) if they want to try.  The question was whether
ygData.messageBody:
They keep on going, people in my guild have gotten between 400-500 on
some resists (with bards of course hehe) if they want to try. The
question was whether they reset to 0 after 255 or stay at 255 or
actually are at a value over 255. Verant said they stay at 255 even if
they go over.

Shada

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: Saturday, August 25, 2001 1:46 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....


Do the numbers even go up after 255? I thought they stayed at 255 on
your
screen no matter your resist. Maybe wrong its been while since I
played.

Mu
